name: branchlet
notes:
measurements:
circumference: 16, (18 , 20, 22, 24)”/41, (46, 51, 56, 61) cm 
height: 7, (8, 8.5, 9, 9.5)” 18, (20, 22, 23, 24) cm

this design is a creative way to use up those odds and ends of leftover yarn that are too pretty to discard but not enough to make a project on their own. 

samples were made using each of the 3 recommended yarns and approximate amounts were calculated for each size. see final photo for details.

![pasted image](/forum-images/onlygrandsons/5dsd7-enfc6w)

this pattern would also look great just using random small stash amounts.

because this is a free pattern it has not been tech edited. if you find any errors or unclear instruction please let me know so that i can make necessary corrections. 

a matching fingerless mitt pattern is now available [here][1]

errata: size xs cast on should be **92** 

size m crown shaping: 
rnd 2/8 should result in a stitch count of **58**
rnd 4/10 should result in a stitch count oh **29**
rnd 6/12 should be (ssk, k2tog)x7, k1. and final stitch count should be **15**


  [1]: https://www.ravelry.com/patterns/library/branchlet-mitts
